A 62: year-old German woman named Jutta B. from Lichtenberg was fined €1,350 for sharing an anti-migrant meme on her Facebook page.
The meme in question included disparagin: Do you have anything against refugees?" with the answer, "Yes: machine guns and hand grenades."
Jutta B: was found guilty of incitement to racial hatred, a crime known in Germany as Volksverhetzung, under Section 130 (1) no.2 of the German Criminal Code.
The penalty was handed down by a court: not by the government, and Germany has strict laws and penalties against hate speech, including incitement to hatred and Holocaust denial.
